original: @231a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @231a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i badzra dha ra sam g'i ti bha ga b'a na sto tra:/
analyzed: shr'i badzra dha ra sam g'i ti bha ga b'a na sto tra:/
translated: Śrīvajradharagarbhigītibhagavatastotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dpal rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbyangs /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dpal rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbyangs /
translated: The Glorious Song of Vajra Holder in Praise of the Bhagavān

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrasattva.

original: mnyam med mi g-yo mnyam nyid mchog chos can //
analyzed: mnyam med mi g-yo mnyam nyid mchog chos can //
translated: You are the one with the supreme quality of unchanging, unequaled equanimity,

original: thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel //
analyzed: thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel //
translated: The embodiment of compassion, dispeller of beings' suffering,

original: yon tan kun mnyam mtha' med dngos grub stsol //
analyzed: yon tan kun mnyam mtha' med dngos grub stsol //
translated: Grantor of attainments equal to all qualities, limitless and unequaled.

original: dri med mi g-yo mnyam med mchog rab chos //
analyzed: dri med mi g-yo mnyam med mchog rab chos //
translated: You are the stainless, unwavering, unequaled, supreme Dharma,

original: sems can khams la rtag mchog grub stsol ba //
analyzed: sems can khams la rtag mchog grub stsol ba //
translated: Grantor of the supreme attainment always in the realm of beings.

original: dngos grub mnyam dang mtha' med dpe bral ba //
analyzed: dngos grub mnyam dang mtha' med dpe bral ba //
translated: Attainments are equal, limitless, and beyond analogy.

original: mnyam pa'i dpe nyid nam mkha' la med de //
analyzed: mnyam pa'i dpe nyid nam mkha' la med de //
translated: Even the analogy of equality does not exist in space,

original: yon tan shas phra'i chas kyang mtshungs ma yin //
analyzed: yon tan shas phra'i chas kyang mtshungs ma yin //
translated: And even a tiny fraction of qualities is not the same.

original: rtag tu dri med thugs rje'i shugs las byung //
analyzed: rtag tu dri med thugs rje'i shugs las byung //
translated: Always arising from the force of stainless compassion,

original: smon lam grub pa 'gag med chos nyid can //
analyzed: smon lam grub pa 'gag med chos nyid can //
translated: Fulfilled aspirations, the nature of unobstructed phenomena,

original: 'gro ba'i don sgrub lhur mdzad mtha' yas pa //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don sgrub lhur mdzad mtha' yas pa //
translated: You are the embodiment of the infinite intent to accomplish the welfare of beings.

original: thugs rje'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang //
analyzed: thugs rje'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang //
translated: The nature of compassion is always manifest.

original: dpag med mi dpogs gnas nyid legs rdzogs pa //
analyzed: dpag med mi dpogs gnas nyid legs rdzogs pa //
translated: The state of immeasurability is perfectly complete.

original: bde gnas gshegs kyang thugs rje'i spyod mi g-yo //
analyzed: bde gnas gshegs kyang thugs rje'i spyod mi g-yo //
translated: Even though he has gone to the state of bliss, his compassionate activity never wavers.

original: 'jig rten gsum la mchog gi grub stsol ba //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum la mchog gi grub stsol ba //
translated: He grants the supreme accomplishment to the three worlds.

original: 'gag nyid mi 'gyur ae ma'i chos nyid bzang //
analyzed: 'gag nyid mi 'gyur ae ma'i chos nyid bzang //
translated: The nature of phenomena is excellent, unchanging, and unceasing.

original: mchog stsol sbyin mchog nyid gnas chos nyid brnyes /
analyzed: mchog stsol sbyin mchog nyid gnas chos nyid brnyes /
translated: He grants the supreme gift, abides in the nature of phenomena, and accomplishes the supreme.

original: 'jig rten gsum rtag dam pa stsol mchog sgrub //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum rtag dam pa stsol mchog sgrub //
translated: He always grants the supreme to the three worlds.

original: bde gshegs dus gsum mkhyen sgrib mi mnga' ba //
analyzed: bde gshegs dus gsum mkhyen sgrib mi mnga' ba //
translated: The Sugata, knowing the three times, is unobstructed.

original: kun gyi dam tshig gsum mchog grub bdag stsol //
analyzed: kun gyi dam tshig gsum mchog grub bdag stsol //
translated: He grants the supreme accomplishment of the three commitments of all.

original: bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dpal rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbyangs rdzogs so /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dpal rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbyangs rdzogs so /
translated: The praise of the Bhagavat, the melody of the glorious Vajra Holder, is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidy'a ka ra pra bha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing @231b zhus te gtan la phab pa//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidy'a ka ra pra bha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing @231b zhus te gtan la phab pa//
translated: The Indian abbot Vidyākaraprabha and the great translator-editor Bandé Paltsek translated, edited, and finalized this text.
